Title: Data School - Introductory SQL Concepts
Description: Learn how to use SQL with your PostgreSQL database.

Title: Excel to SQL crosswalk
Description: Compares how to do something in spreadsheets (such as Excel) to doing the same things with structured query language (SQL).

Title: Select Star SQL
Description: This is an interactive book which aims to be the best place on the internet for learning SQL.

Title: Khan Academy - Intro to SQL: Querying and managing data
Description: Khan Academy offers an Intro to SQL tutorial with free videos and exercises. It covers basic functions, joins, database modification, and more.

Title: SQL Tutorial - W3 Schools
Description: This SQL tutorial will teach you how to use SQL in: MySQL, SQL Server, MS Access, Oracle, Sybase, Informix, Postgres, and other database systems.
